text: Itte yaru ga i. `Arra ni shitagai, shito ni shitagae. Anata gataga moshi somuki saru to shite mo, kare ni hakare no owasa reta tsutome ga ari, anata gata ni mo anata gata no owasa reta mono ga aru. Daga anata gataga moshi kare ni shitagaunaraba, tadashiku michibika rerudearou. Shito ni kase rareru koto wa, tada meiryo ni (keiji o) tsutaeru dakedearu
